alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 5:02PM CDT until August 18 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 502 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greater Greenspoint, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greater Greenspoint, Aldine, northern Northside / Northline, Hidden Valley, Acres Home, Greater Inwood and Eastex / Jensen Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
